content.description:
follow the beautiful golden corner



Rumours wall. 

park at pull out 1km west of upper hat creek rd, and walk up faint trail to the roof features that poke out above the trees as you drive west. (Above 5km east of marble canyon PP) 

9bolts, rap rings for anchor

This is intended to be the single pitch sport climbing section for Marble Canyon, as there will be much development in the coming future.  
 Rumours is a play on the history of the area being an amazing alpine-esc area, with multi pitch trad routes, and recently multi-pitch sport routes.  
  
 The first wall to be mentioned in this description is called ‘Rumours Wall’ in pretence to the rumours that marble canyon has some really great single pitch sport climbing, on limestone!   
 Located just west of Upper Hat Creek Rd, the easy 10min approach will be a great addition and escape to the summer heat. Rumours wall is north facing, over hung enough to stay dry in light rain, with big tree canopies to keep it cool in the hot summer months.  
  
 There will be more single pitch crags added in shortly, with more compiled information
